settings.title: Get Exclusive Access
settings.text:
Exclusive content, early access to drops, discord channels, inside information, and more!

Join today: https://www.Patreon.com/FoundationDiscGolf

settings.title: Why Choose Foundation?
settings.text: Foundation Disc Golf strives to encourage the passion of new disc golf players and maintain the excitement of existing players through producing new, exciting content on our media outlets, providing the latest in disc golf products on our website, and creating a one-of-a-kind in person experience in our retail stores. By doing so, Foundation strives to create a community of inclusive supporters that trust Foundation to be their sole provider of all things disc golf. Welcome to the Foundation Nation!
